it.cnr.isti.wnlab.indoornavigation.filters.kalmanfilter

Class AbstractKalmanFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.cnr.isti.wnlab.indoornavigation.filters.kalmanfilter.AbstractKalmanFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KalmanFilter, StateEstimationFilter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    StupidKalmanFilter

    public abstract class AbstractKalmanFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements KalmanFilter
    This class represents the method of Kalman Filter. Override this for writing your own implementation.
